name: Classic Cheeseburger & Fries
description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, melted cheddar on a brioche bun. Served with golden fries.

name: Spaghetti & Meatballs
description: Traditional spaghetti topped with homemade marinara sauce and slow-cooked beef meatballs.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil leaves, and olive oil on a thin crispy crust.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan, seasoned croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
